languages.text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy away or makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy, the Warrior becomes that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for 1 round.
languages.original_text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воин{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} противника или наносит {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по площади{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}поражая{/g} только одну цель, то для этого противника на 1 раунд воин становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g}.

traits.locale_text: When the Fighter pushes an enemy away or makes an area attack that hits only one enemy, the Fighter becomes a priority target for that enemy for 1 turn.
When the Fighter pushes an enemy away or makes an area attack that hits only one enemy, the Fighter becomes that enemy's priority target for 1 turn.
When the Fighter pushes an enemy away or makes an area attack that hits only one enemy, the Fighter becomes that enemy's priority target for 1 turn.

When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy away or makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy, the Warrior becomes that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for 1 round.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}воин{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}отталкивает{/g} противника или наносит {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}атаку по площади{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}поражая{/g} только одну цель, то для этого противника на 1 раунд воин становится {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g}.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy away or makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy, the Warrior becomes that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Когда воин отталкивает противника или наносит атаку по площади, поражая только одну цель, то для этого противника на 1 ход воин становится приоритетной целью.
Когда воин отталкивает противника или наносит атаку по площади, поражая только одну цель, то для этого противника на 1 ход воин становится приоритетной целью.

languages.text: 当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}推开{/g}一名敌人，或战士的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}仅仅{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}一名敌人时，战士会成为该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，持续1轮。
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy away or makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy, the Warrior becomes that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: 当战士推开一名敌人，或战士的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}仅仅命中一名敌人时，战士会成为该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，持续1{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}。

当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}战士{/g}推开一名敌人，或战士的{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}范围攻击{/g}仅仅{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}一名敌人时，战士会成为该名敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，持续1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}。

languages.text: Cuando el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrero{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}empuja{/g} a un enemigo o realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} que solamente {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo, se convierte en el {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de ese enemigo durante 1 asalto.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy away or makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy, the Warrior becomes that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Cuando el guerrero empuja a un enemigo o realiza un {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}ataque de área{/g} que solamente {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacta{/g} a un enemigo, se convierte en el {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} de ese enemigo durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Krieger{/g} einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}wegstößt{/g} oder einen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} ausführt, der nur einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, wird der Krieger für 1 Runde zum {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} dieses Feindes.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy away or makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy, the Warrior becomes that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der Krieger einen Feind wegstößt oder einen {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}Flächenangriff{/g} ausführt, der nur einen Feind {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}trifft{/g}, wird der Krieger für 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} zum {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g} dieses Feindes.

languages.text: Lorsque le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}guerrier{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}repousse{/g} un ennemi ou lance une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} qui ne {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}touche{/g} qu'un seul ennemi, il devient la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} de cet ennemi pendant 1 round.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy away or makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy, the Warrior becomes that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le Combattant repousse un ennemi ou lance une {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}attaque de zone{/g} qui ne touche qu'un seul ennemi, il devient la {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} de cet ennemi pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}が敵を{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}突き飛ばす{/g}か、敵1体のみに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を行った場合、そのファイターは1ラウンドの間、その敵の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy away or makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy, the Warrior becomes that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for 1 round.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}が敵を{g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}突き飛ばす{/g}か、敵1体のみに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を行った場合、そのファイターは1ラウンドの間、その敵の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}になる。

{g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}ファイター{/g}が敵を吹き飛ばすか、敵1体のみに{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}命中{/g}する{g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}範囲攻撃{/g}を行った場合、そのファイターは1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、その敵の{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}になる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Savaşçı{/g}, bir düşmanı {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}itip{/g} uzaklaştırdığında veya sadece bir düşmanı {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuran{/g} bir {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}alan saldırısı{/g} gerçekleştirdiğinde o düşmanın {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedefi{/g} hâline gelir. Bu etki, 1 raunt sürer.
languages.original_text: When the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerFighterGlossary}Warrior{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:PushGlossary}pushes{/g} an enemy away or makes an {g|Encyclopedia:AreaOfEffect}area attack{/g} that {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hits{/g} only one enemy, the Warrior becomes that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} for 1 round.
